title: Purito Centella SPF Is Now Available Scent-Free
text:
1 item in this article Photo: Purito

One of the great (beauty) loves of my life is Purito’s Centella-infused sunscreen, which I picked up at oo35mm on a whim a few months back, and have used nearly every single day since. Not only is it SPF 50 and PA++++ (the highest grade protection against UVAs available), it’s actively soothing on the skin (I find it actually helps prevent breakouts), ultra hydrating (I used it in lieu of a moisturizer all summer long), and leaves no white cast. It’s very nearly perfect (you all seem to agree: the stuff shows up constantly in our What Strategist Readers Are Buying column). Except one, tiny little thing: the lavender scent. While I myself am not particularly bothered by it, I know some of you scent-sensitive beauty lovers (and essential oil-allergic beauty lovers) are. If this describes you, I come bearing good news: Purito just launched a scentless version of their Centella SPF. It has all of the same nourishing, skin-protecting ingredients, without notes of lavender. I’d recommend stocking up.

description: Purito Centella SPF, which is better than any other sunscreen on the market and has healing and soothing properties, is now available without the lavender scent.
